verses.verse: But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> that were with him in the <S%H8392>ark;<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> caused a <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7918>subsided.<s%>

Also the <S%H4599>fountains<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> and the <S%H699>floodgates<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> were <S%H5534>closed,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> was <S%H3607>restrained;<s%>

and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7725>receded<s%> <S%H1980>steadily<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2637>decreased.<s%>

And in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H2637>decreased<s%> <S%H1980>steadily<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> month, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>became<s%> <S%H7200>visible.<s%>

Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made;<s%>

and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out a <S%H6158>raven,<s%> and it <S%H3318>flew<s%> <S%H3318>here<s%> and <S%H7725>there<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3001>dried<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Then he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out a <S%H3123>dove<s%> from him, to <S%H7200>see<s%> if the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H7043>abated<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>land;<s%>

but the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4494>resting<s%> <S%H4494>place<s%> for the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot,<s%> so she <S%H7725>returned<s%> to him into the <S%H8392>ark;<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> was on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Then he <S%H7971>put<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> her, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her into the <S%H8392>ark<s%> to himself.
So he <S%H9123>waited<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3254>again<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> out the <S%H3123>dove<s%> from the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>

And the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him toward <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in her <S%H6310>beak<s%> was a <S%H2965>freshly<s%> <S%H2965>picked<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H5929>leaf.<s%> So <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H7043>abated<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then he <S%H3176>waited<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> out the <S%H3123>dove;<s%> but she did not <S%H7725>return<s%> to him <S%H3254>again.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the month, the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H9162>dried<s%> up from the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Then <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H9162>dried<s%> up.
And in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the twenty-seventh <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H3001>dry.<s%>
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3318>"Go<s%> out of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> you and your <S%H802>wife<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your sons' <S%H802>wives<s%> with you.

<S%H3318>"Bring<s%> out with you <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>thing<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that is with you, <S%H5775>birds<s%> and <S%H929>animals<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that they may <S%H8317>breed<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
So <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his sons' <S%H802>wives<s%> with him.

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H9130>beast,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>thing,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>bird,<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> that <S%H7430>moves<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out by their <S%H4940>families<s%> from the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>

Then <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9552>smelled<s%> the <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>Himself,<s%> "I will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> on <S%H5668>account<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> for the <S%H3336>intent<s%> of man's <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth;<s%> and I will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5221>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>thing,<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done.<s%>

<S%H5750>"While<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5750>remains,<s%> <S%H2233>Seedtime<s%> and <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> And <S%H7120>cold<s%> and <S%H2527>heat,<s%> And <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter,<s%> And <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> Shall not <S%H7673>cease.<s%>"
